    • Uses of Invalidatable in components

      Methods in components with parameters of type Invalidatable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean IComponent.addInvalidatable(Invalidatable invalidatable)
      Adds the given Invalidatable to the list of invalidatables.
      boolean IComponent.containsInvalidatable(Invalidatable invalidatable)
      Returns true if the list of invalidatables contains the specified element.
      void IComponent.removeInvalidatable(Invalidatable invalidatable)
      Removes the parameter from the list of invalidatables.

    • Uses of Invalidatable in components.audio

      Classes in components.audio that implement Invalidatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AudioListenerComponent
      The scene's audio listener and it's position, orientation and velocity affects how we hear audio sources' sounds.
      class  AudioSourceComponent
      Audio sources can emit sounds.

    • Uses of Invalidatable in components.camera

      Classes in components.camera that implement Invalidatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CameraComponent
      Implements basic camera functions.
      class  FreeCameraComponent
      This class extends the DefaultCameraComponent and allows the user to control the camera movement and rotation by the keyboard.

    • Uses of Invalidatable in components.light

      Classes in components.light that implement Invalidatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultLightComponent
      This abstract class stores the light's diffuse, specular and ambient components.
      class  DirectionalLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a directional light source.
      class  PointLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a point light source.
      class  SpotLightComponent
      Basic implementation of a spot light source.

    • Uses of Invalidatable in components.renderables

      Classes in components.renderables that implement Invalidatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MeshComponent
      Encapsulates a Mesh and a Material.
      class  SplineComponent
      Encapsulates a Spline and a Material.

    • Uses of Invalidatable in core

      Classes in core that implement Invalidatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Component
      All of a GameObject's Components based on this abstract class.
      class  Transform
      Stores a GameObject's transformation data.
